meanings.definition: The act or process of swelling or becoming swollen.
meanings.sent1: After the injury, the tumefaction of his ankle was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The tumefaction of the balloon as it filled with air was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent3: The tumefaction of the cake in the oven made it look like a giant muffin.
meanings.sent4: The tumefaction of emotions in her heart overwhelmed her with joy.
meanings.sent5: The tumefaction of the storm clouds signaled an impending downpour.

meanings.definition: A swollen or enlarged area on the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the tumefaction on the patient's arm.
meanings.sent2: She applied a cold compress to the tumefaction to reduce the swelling.
meanings.sent3: The tumefaction on his forehead from the bee sting made him look like a unicorn.
meanings.sent4: The tumefaction of the river after heavy rain caused flooding in the area.
meanings.sent5: The tumefaction on the tree trunk indicated a termite infestation.
